descriptor:
C asks other people's opinion about his appearance 
+ M offers to help him get back in shape
theme song
transition
M knocks on C's door to go for a run
C comes out of his house in tight shorts and M points out to him
transition
M w C are running
Once inside, M asks him to do sit-ups
C complains to J about his training w M
Pb tells her date last night
M arrives at the cafe with rackets balls for C
Pb asks Ra not to look outside because R and Julie are kissing
R and Julie are going to adopt a cat + Ra wants R to know that she has a date
transition
Ra w Micheal are on a date at the resto
Pb confides in J and doubts her charms
M w C are outside the cafe bickering
Ra is drunk + Michael offers his advice
Ra asks if she can use a customer's cell phone to call R
transition
M picks up C to go running
C tells him the famous "stop", but M insists that he continue !
